column5: Thinking about heading to Maitland for perch on the weekend. I heard the perch were starting to show up but the big storm last week scattered them. Wondering if anyone has any up to date info for this week. Its the only time of year I keep fish usually and dont want to miss it. PM's welcome as well  Thanks  Darren
I'd be curious as well. It would be nice to sit on the pier and catch a bunch of big perch.
if you want big perch go to Port Burwell on the rocks or if you have a boat even better  here's a 13.5" fatty
Maitland, dover, ryerse, burwell.. All have perch nearby this time of year.
Port Bruce has ZERO perch this year DO NOT waste your time going there....
